order by ${select} desc ) A ) where rn between #{start} and #{end}

choose.when: where show='y' and (subject like #{keyword} or contents like #{keyword} or a.userid like #{keyword})
choose.otherwise: where category=#{category} and show='y' and (subject like #{keyword} or contents like #{keyword} or a.userid like #{keyword})

mapper.select: select passwd from qna where q_idx = #{q_idx}

select a.q_idx,a.userid,a.subject,a.contents,a.category,a.passwd, a.view_count, a.write_date, a.show, b.profile_img, (select count(*) from qna_scrap where a.q_idx=q_idx)as scrap ,(select count(*) from qna_likey where a.q_idx=q_idx )as likey, (select count(*) from qna_comment where a.q_idx=q_idx) as comment_count from qna a join guest b on a.userid=b.userid where q_idx=#{q_idx}
select count(*) from qna where q_idx=#{q_idx} and passwd=#{passwd}
